transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji, aawaz aa rahi hai madam?
Customer: Haan ji, aa rahi hai. Aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai. Madam, main Sushil Mishra baat kar raha hun, SDEC India Private Limited se.
Executive: Uh, which company?
Customer: SDEC India Private Limited.
Executive: SDEC?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haan ji, bataiye.
Customer: Madam, ye uh aapke yahan pe mere paas koi subscription li hai aapki?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aur isme problem aa rahi hai mujhe jab bhi isko ladke login kar rahe hain to isme ek bank detail ke liye aa rahi hai baar baar. Kya issue hai?
Executive: Ek second. Dekh leti hun.
Customer: Sunil ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Executive: Ji?
Executive: Sunil ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Sushil Mishra.
Executive: Haan ji sir, main Prachi baat kar rahi hun. Last aap se baat hui thi na meri?
Customer: Haan, oh madam bataiye. Madam, isme kya ho raha hai? Aapne number I think save nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Achha, achha, achha, sorry ji. Actually kya hai dekho ab mere paas abhi, abhi mujhe pata chala kuch aisa ho raha hai. Main last time jab aapko gayi thi, fir main bahar chala gaya tha, pata nahi kya hai.
Executive: Aapne aaj ki date mein bhi matlab 96 wale number pe call kiya tha?
Customer: Haan, shayad.
Executive: Sir, maine aapko pehle bhi kaha tha ki is number ko save kar lijiye. Jab bhi koi issue hota hai aapko is number pe call karna hai. Other number pe nahi karna hai. Kyunki pata hai kya hota hai? Agar aap 96 wale number pe call karte ho customer care wale pe, to mere against complaint raise ho jati hai. Aaj bhi same hua hai.
Customer: Achha, ji abhi aapko number pe call gaya, 80471 hai, last mein 8030.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Aapka number kya hai batao na, mujhe pata nahi.
Executive: Yahi hai jispe aapne call kiya hai.
Customer: 9696 aap karte hain?
Executive: Nahi, nahi.
Executive: Ab ye maine WhatsApp bhi aapko kiya hua hai, 781 karke. Main abhi WhatsApp pe share kar dungi. Us number pe aapko call karna hai, wohi save kar lijiyega. 96 wale pe call nahi karna hai. Woh customer care ka number hai. Uspe aapne call karte ho na, to mere against complaint raise ho jati hai jo ki abhi hui hai.
Executive: Aap bataiye aapka issue jo wo buyer wala?
Customer: Abhi mujhe to pata nahi hai. Agar mere paas to baat aayegi, to main to number se contact nahi ho jata. Hai na? Ab mere paas to baat aayegi to main to number niche laga deta, theek hai aapki.
Executive: Okay, baat hai, kya baat hai.
Executive: Haan ji, abhi baat hui thi. Sushil Mishra hai agar uh Prachi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Prachi.
Customer: Prachi. Haan ji.
Executive: Okay. Main ek, last time aap se discussion hua tha ye aapka jo complaint tha jo buyer wala issue tha wo ki aapne jo us buyer se business kiya hi nahi hai.
Customer: Haan, wo to last time bhai aapko, mere khayal se to sambandh mere paas thi. Iske aage baat dil se nahi hogi.
Executive: Nahi, 10-15 din nahi, abhi hua hai 14th ko baat hui thi hamari. Ek second. Shayad wo uh, kuch din se aapki baat hui.
Customer: Haan ji, wo bhi deal karte hain na?
Customer: Haan, ji, haan ji se baat hui hogi wo. Wo yahan pe 14th ko correct. Haan, haan, haan, haan. Ab fir to main shayad mere khayal se fir, fir bhi wo resolve nahi hua. To fir mere paas aayi.
Executive: Wo abhi hamare team member ne bhi unse baat ki thi, jo aapke business partner, mere manager ne bhi unse baat ki thi. To abhi na thoda wait karna hoga. Abhi wo chal raha hai. To jo dusri team hai wahi aapko call karti hai jaise ki bataya tha ki humne to business nahi kiya. To sari cheeze unko bhejni thi, wahi deal karte hain. To wo aapko call karenge. Abhi kiya bhi hoga, mail bhi aaya hoga team ki side se. To ye jo complaint hai wo dusri team hi deal karti hai.
Customer: Koi bhi mail nahi mila mujhe.
Executive: Abhi main uh ek kaam karti hun. Aap ticket generate kar dijiye unka.
Executive: Abhi to sir main lunch pe ja rahi hun to thodi der baad call back kar paungi. Main ek baar apne senior se coordinate karke aapko call karti hun.
Customer: No issue, no issue, koi dikkat nahi. Aap ticket generate kar dena. Theek hai, ye complaint aise padi rehne dena. Ye ticket aise padi rehne dena.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi, lunch pe abhi aa rahi hun to ek baar na senior se call kara deti hun. To wo aapko aur acche se cheeze bata denge ki aapko kya karna hai.
Customer: Fatfat ek ticket generate kar dena.
Customer: Madam, ek ticket generate kar dena madam, theek hai. Ab jab tak resolve nahi hota hai, service chale na chale koi dikkat nahi. Jab tak ek ticket generate kar do meri taraf se, continue.
Executive: Nahi, ye to continue chal hi raha hai, ye close nahi hua hai. Jo wo buyer wala issue hai na, wo to chal hi raha hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi.
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Customer: Nahi, close kiya hai in logo ne, close kiya tha field pe.
Executive: Dekhiye, wo close pata hai kya hua tha jab last baat hui? Wo close hua tha ki jo mere against unhone jaise aapne abhi 96 wale number pe call kiya hai. Jo aapke business partner hain unhone bhi 96 number wale pe call kar diya tha. To uski jo jata hai na jab hum close karte hain ki jo mere against uh raise hui complaint, uska jata hai wo. Baki jo aapki complaint hai wo buyer wali wo to chal hi rahi hai.
Executive: To abhi jo aapne 96 wale number pe call kara hai, usko main abhi close kar do jo mere against complaint raise hui hai?
Customer: Are aapke against mein to IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun madam, kaha meri complaint kaha khatam hui? Meri problem to just ticket se.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, are sir. Jo complaint hai wo nahi chal rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi, main aapke against nahi kari hai. Main to IndiaMART pe kar raha hun. Isko aap convert kar dena ki bhai is team wo hai, uske liye main call kiya tha. Daal dena issue ki bhai team se.
Executive: Main WhatsApp kar dungi. Usi number pe aapko call karna hai. Jab aap 96 wale pe karte ho na customer care wale pe, to wo hamare against complaint raise ho jati hai. Uspe nahi karna hai next time se.
Customer: Wo na, meri complaint kar do aap ki mujhe issue ye aa raha hai ki mujhe jo bhi cheez chahiye mail by mail chahiye. Mail pe dijiye. Mere taraf kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Mujhe return mein chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai, uske regarding ek baar main senior se discuss kara dungi. Abhi lunch ke baad abhi thodi der mein 3:00 baje ke baad main aapko call karti hun, theek hai?
Customer: No issue, no issue. Aur second cheez jo abhi aapne 96 number wale pe call kari thi, jo complaint raise hui hai usko main close kar doon abhi?
Executive: Aise kar do madam, main abhi to complaint to. Sir, mere against raise hui hai wo aapke buyer wale.
Customer: Koi baat nahi madam, thoda sa aap bhi thoda sa dekho jaise mere ladke pareshan hai thoda sa aap bhi thoda sa do na wait, thoda wait aap bhi le lo kya dikkat hai. Thoda halka ho jayega inke bachchon ka.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Thoda sa inka, inka vajan thoda halka ho jayega na, thoda aapke upar aa jayega, vajan halka hoga aapka, inka. Abhi koi baat nahi, teen din baad sun lete hain ek baar. Ek baar teen din ke baad dobara sun lete hain na, kya dikkat hai?
Executive: Theek hai madam, main call back karti hun. Okay.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's boys facing bank detail issue.

- Complaint raised against executive due to call.

- Wants all communication via mail.



Resolution:

- Executive shared correct contact number.

- Assured issue will be discussed with senior.

- Agreed to generate a ticket for the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after lunch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, complaint, mail, ticket, number
